tool_description: LokDon APIs are one of a kind built from LokDon ECSMID V 1.0.0, SDK, a next generation Cybersecurity, data/information security, and privacy control layer 1 (foundational) software packaged as a robust, fast, low-cost, security module as a software service (SMaaSS) using patented key less, e2e encryptiong. It is platform-agnostic and data security integration solution for authentication. This is based on a latice face key less infrastructure (LFKI). It has a base matrix of 2048 bits: Which me...
name: LokDon ECSMID V 1.0.0
title: LokDon ECSMID V 1.0.0

api_list.name: decryptGeneric
api_list.description: Decrypts the cipher-text returned from the *encrypt/generic* endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lokdon-ecsmid-v-1-0-0.p.rapidapi.com/v1/decrypt/generic"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lokdon-ecsmid-v-1-0-0.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: decryptPin

api_list.name: encryptGeneric
api_list.description: Encrypts generic text or string with M3 mode and returns the cipher-text with original text.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lokdon-ecsmid-v-1-0-0.p.rapidapi.com/v1/encrypt/generic"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lokdon-ecsmid-v-1-0-0.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: decryptFiles
api_list.description: Decrypts multiple encrypted files and returns a link to the decrypted file in order. Make sure to use the file-type extension from the **encrypt/binary** API to correctly open the file after download.

api_list.name: encryptPin
api_list.description: Encrypts security pin with length 4 or 6 depending on your needs. For non numeric or longer pin, please use the **encrypt/password** API instead. This API returns both M3 and M2 modes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lokdon-ecsmid-v-1-0-0.p.rapidapi.com/v1/encrypt/pin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lokdon-ecsmid-v-1-0-0.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: encryptPassword
api_list.description: Encrypts text based password and returns the cipher text.
api_list.code:

url = "https://lokdon-ecsmid-v-1-0-0.p.rapidapi.com/v1/encrypt/password"

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lokdon-ecsmid-v-1-0-0.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

api_list.name: encryptfiles
api_list.description: Encrypts multiple files and returns a link to download each file as a resource. Any file type is supported but keep reference to the file type extension when you work with this API.

api_list.name: decryptPassword
api_list.description: Decrypts the encrypted password returned from **encrypt/password** API.
